content:
Action:1

I'm pushing left to have the avatar hit the box at (2,5) so it bounces to (2,4), working toward aligning it with the hole at (1,3). I expect the avatar to move into (2,5) while the box advances, setting us up for subsequent moves.

Action:1

I'm pushing left so that the box at (2,4) bounces into (2,3), positioning it for a subsequent move to push it upward into the hole at (1,3), which aligns with our goal of clearing the box safely.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (2,4) to (3,4) so I can then approach the box (at 2,3) from below and push it upward into the hole at (1,3), which aligns with our strategy.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (3,4) to (3,3) so that I can later push the box at (2,3) upward into the hole at (1,3) in accordance with our strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving upward, which should push the box at (2,3) into the hole at (1,3), removing it and aligning with our strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,3) to (3,3) to position myself above the box, so I can push it downward toward the hole at (6,3), following the strategy to clear boxes one by one.

Action:3

I'm pushing downward so that the avatar collides with the box, causing it to bounce from (4,3) to (5,3), setting it up to be pushed into the hole on the next move.

Action:3

I'm moving downward so that my avatar collides with the box, pushing it into the hole at row 6, col 3, which should remove the box and achieve the objective.
